name: timetagger
description: TimeTagger is a self-hosted time tracking app that makes it easy to start, stop, and categorize work sessions. It offers reporting, tags, and flexible views through a responsive browser interface.
features: Quick tracking: Start and stop time tracking with a single click for effortless session logging.
Tag-based: Organize time entries with flexible tags instead of rigid project hierarchies.
Reporting: Generate reports showing time spent by tag, date range, or custom groupings.
Flexible views: View tracked time in timeline, calendar, or summary views to match your workflow.
Responsive interface: Track time from desktop or mobile devices with a clean, intuitive interface.
Manual entries: Add or edit time entries manually for past work or corrections.
Running timer: See currently running timer with elapsed time displayed prominently.
Export data: Export time tracking data in CSV or other formats for invoicing or analysis.
Privacy-focused: Keep all time tracking data on your own server with complete control.
Keyboard shortcuts: Use keyboard shortcuts for rapid time entry and navigation.
Statistics: View statistics on time spent across different activities and time periods.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements for always-on tracking.
